mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_data_body_mass_index ( bmiID , associateID , measureTime , height , weight , upload , RES , creatTime , describtion , deleteFlag ) VALUES ( #{bmiID} , #{associateID} , #{measureTime} , #{height} , #{weight} , #{upload} , #{rES} , #{creatTime} , #{describtion} , #{deleteFlag} )
